title: Excuse me Riot. How can we refund now? I can't navigate the new shop menu and find where I used to b
body:
Exactly as the title says, Where is the refunds tab that used to be in the shop???

An answer with a picture would be great - 

Cheers
Anonryukai

replies.body: Yeah I don't know where its gone either. Maybe theres no more refunds? I'll check patch notes.

It's over by the Right, after gifting
http://i.imgur.com/YVVaNYz.png
